Package jmud

Class Summary
Character Represents a player character.
ChatColor Holds a representation for ANSI color codes and provides methods for color formatting strings.
ClientDescriptor Represents a client connection and handles socket IO for each connection.
Command Represents a command entry, including its name, aliases, and minimum character level required to use the command.
CommandHandler Handles command input from clients and dispatches each command.
Entity Represents an entity.
JMud A Java MUD server project.
Person Represents a person entity.
Room Represents a room that can contain entities.
RoomList List of all rooms on the server.
Server Server class that handles connecting and communicating with clients.
